title: Bought runes and they are not showing up in my collection
body:
Hello,

I bought 2 greater quintessences of lethality (the purchase can be seen in my purchase history) but they are not showing up in my rune collection and the store now says I own none of them.

I can provide screenshots if need be.

I tried restarting the client several times but it doesn't help. Any advices? 

Thank you.

replies.body: I've got your account pulled up and I do see where the store let you purchase those 2 quints and they were never added (the one additional one you bought was added correctly). Since we're noticing such a large amount of EU players being affected by this type of error, I'm asking you all start submitting [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that we can track and get this fixed as quickly as possible.

I bought another greater quintessence of lethality, this one is showing up normal, the previous two still not, and the store gives me the option of buying even more of the same runes.

It seems I just lost 2k IP. Can also provide screenshots of the latest purchase.
